items.title: How Instagram’s ‘Deliberate Design Choices’ Make It Unsafe for Teens Despite Meta Promises, Report Says
items.description: The findings come from a new report by a whistleblower and four nonprofit groups.

items.title: Want to Perform at Your Physical Best? Science Says First Think About Mental Effort (and Energy)
items.description: Mental fatigue affects your focus, decision-making, and cognitive skills. But it can also affect how well you perform physically.

items.title: At a Yale Gathering, Top CEOs Shared Their Real Thoughts on Trump’s Policies
items.description: The administration gets lavish praise from business leaders in public. Their private opinions could surprise you.

items.title: The No. 1 Thing We Can Learn About Healthy Aging From Hunter-Gatherers, Says This Anthropologist
items.description: Forget ‘paleo’ diets or exercise routines, the most important thing our ancestors can teach us about healthy aging is totally different.

items.title: Amazon Just Learned a $2.5 Billion Lesson About How Not to Treat Customers
